tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE images (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    image_label VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ImageLabels (
    image_id INT,
    label_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (image_id, label_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES Images(image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (label_id) REFERENCES Labels(label_id)
);

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    tag_id INT NOT NULL,
    label_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES images(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES image_tags(tag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (label_id) REFERENCES image_labels(label_id)
);
